title: 💖🏡 Home Is Where The Heart Is. 🏡💖
posting_body: Say YES to the Address!
The Arts at South Austin has the perfect apartment in a quiet neighborhood that will make you feel right at home!
We have a beautiful premier 2 Bed 1.5 bath Townhome available as soon as September 24th!
This apartment home is just steps away from all the convenience our community has to offer.

Beat the heat at our sparkling swimming pool, squeeze a workout in at our 24-hour fitness center, invite the folks over for a BBQ picnic in one of our beautiful courtyards, or get some work done at our 24-hour business center with free Wi-Fi.
Our friendly on-site management team works hard to make sure all of our residents are comfortable in their homes, and residents are always at ease knowing maintenance is on call 24 hours a day.
Our gated community also features an onsite laundry facility and conveniently accepts online payments and is very pet-friendly!
Today the pricing for a lease start date of 09/24/22 and a lease term of 13 months the price is $1777
*Pricing and availability change daily and are dependent on lease term and lease start date.
Call for the most up to date prices.
Apartment features:
*Granite Countertops
*Mosaic Tile Backsplash in Kitchen
*Cherry Wood Cabinets
*Home Décor Lighting
*Vinyl Hardwood Plank Flooring Throughout
*New Carpet in the Bedrooms and Stairs
*WASHER and DRYER INCLUDED!!
*Open Back Patio from the Living Room
*Rainfall Showerhead
*European Bowl Sinks
In our Community, you will find
*Professionally-equipped 24-hour Fitness Center
*24-hour Business Center with Free Printing
*Resort-style Pool with Plenty of Lounge Chairs and Tables as well as a BBQ section
*BBQ Grills and Picnic Tables throughout the community
*Amazing Dog Park Perfect for your Furry Friends!
*Beautiful landscaped courtyards within each Building
*24-hour Laundry Center
Our perfect south central location keeps resident close to everything Austin has to offer.
We’re just 10 minutes from downtown and only 5 minutes to the trendy SoCo District.
Grab a bite at P. Terry's or Torchy's Tacos, or catch a show at one the many nearby live music venues.
Shorten your work commute with easy access to I35, MoPac, and Hwy 71/Ben White, and keep your kitchen stocked with just a short drive to your neighborhood HEB, Wal-Mart, or Central Market.
We also have MULTIPLE public transportation stops just outside our gates.
The best shopping, dining, and entertainment in town is always just a short drive away.
ALL PICTURES SHOWN ARE FOR ILLUSTRATION PURPOSE ONLY.
ACTUAL PRODUCT
MAY VARY DUE TO PRODUCT ENHANCEMENT.
Call today or just stop on by and ask about apartment #309!
Ask for Arianna and mention you found us on craigslist!
Arts at South Austin
